section.title: Breeder Distribution Variance by Item
section.para: A Breeder Item is an Item from which other Items--or by-products--are produced. To view breeder distribution variances by Item, select the "Breeder Distribution Variance by Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing breeder distribution variances by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose breeder distribution variances by Item you want to view.
Select to display breeder distribution variances by Item for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose breeder distribution variances by Item you want to display.
Breeder distribution variances by Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Breeder distribution variances by Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.Runs the report associated with this screen.
Display lists breeder distribution variances by Item, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
